name: Thin Ice (caioguedes)
description:
Biweekly Games 2 - Thin Ice

A small puzzle game about a snowman cracking the ice below them.

Move the snowman and break all the ice in a level to complete it.You can only move to adjacent ice tiles (in any of 6 directions), and a tile can have different heights.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Click: Move to adjacent ice tile.

More info:

This game was made on a personal challenge to develop and release one game every 2 weeks on my spare time around school and work. I generate a random theme prompt to poll ideas from, and the theme for this game was "Fragile". You can read more about this game here.

Credits:
